author: Digix Holdings
title: Interactive DAO contract for creating/modifying/endorsing proposals
name: Dao

inputs.name: _proposalIds
inputs.description: Array of proposal IDs

abiDocs.name: founderCloseProposals
abiDocs.details: all proposals who are not yet finalized, and been there for more than the threshold time
abiDocs.notice: Function for founders to close all the dead proposals

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the proposal

abiDocs.name: closeProposal
abiDocs.details: Can only be closed if the proposal has not been finalized yet
abiDocs.notice: Function to close proposal (also get back collateral)

inputs.name: _doc
inputs.description: hash of the IPFS doc of the special proposal details

inputs.name: _uintConfigs
inputs.description: Array of the new UINT256 configs

inputs.name: _addressConfigs
inputs.description: Array of the new Address configs

inputs.name: _bytesConfigs
inputs.description: Array of the new Bytes32 configs

abiDocs.name: createSpecialProposal
abiDocs.notice: Function to create a Special Proposal (can only be created by the founders)

inputs.name: _docIpfsHash
inputs.description: Hash of the IPFS doc containing details of proposal

inputs.name: _milestonesFundings
inputs.description: Array of fundings of the proposal milestones (in wei)

inputs.name: _finalReward
inputs.description: Final reward asked by proposer at successful completion of all milestones of proposal

abiDocs.name: submitPreproposal
abiDocs.notice: Submit a new preliminary idea / Pre-proposal

inputs.name: _key
inputs.description: the resolver key to look up

abiDocs.name: get_contract
abiDocs.details: Get the address of a contract

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the proposal

abiDocs.name: finalizeProposal
abiDocs.details: After finalizing a proposal, it cannot be modified further

abiDocs.name: claimOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the special proposal

abiDocs.name: startSpecialProposalVoting
abiDocs.notice: Function to set start of voting round for special proposal

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the proposal

inputs.name: _milestoneIndex
inputs.description: Index of the milestone. Index starts from 0 (for the first milestone)

abiDocs.name: finishMilestone
abiDocs.details: This can only be called in the Main Phase of DigixDAO by the proposer. It sets the voting time for the next milestone. If not enough time left in the current quarter, then the next voting is postponed to the start of next quarter
abiDocs.notice: Function to set milestone to be completed

inputs.name: _start
inputs.description: Start time of the first quarter in the DAO

abiDocs.name: setStartOfFirstQuarter
abiDocs.notice: Call this function to mark the start of the DAO's first quarter. This can only be done once, by a founder

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the proposal

inputs.name: _milestonesFundings
inputs.description: Array of fundings for milestones

inputs.name: _finalReward
inputs.description: Final reward needed for completion of proposal

inputs.name: _currentMilestone
inputs.description: the milestone number the proposal is currently in

abiDocs.name: changeFundings
abiDocs.details: Proposers can only change fundings for the subsequent milestones, during the duration of an on-going milestone (so, cannot be during any voting phase)
abiDocs.notice: Function to change the funding structure for a proposal

abiDocs.name: renounceOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
abiDocs.notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the proposal

inputs.name: _doc
inputs.description: hash of IPFS uploaded document, containing details of PRL Action

abiDocs.name: updatePRL
abiDocs.notice: Function to update the PRL (regulatory status) status of a proposal

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the proposal (hash of IPFS doc of the first version of the proposal)

abiDocs.name: endorseProposal
abiDocs.notice: Function to endorse a pre-proposal (can be called only by DAO Moderator)

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: Proposal ID (hash of IPFS doc of the first version of the proposal)

inputs.name: _docIpfsHash
inputs.description: Hash of IPFS doc of the modified version of the proposal

inputs.name: _milestonesFundings
inputs.description: Array of fundings of the modified version of the proposal (in wei)

inputs.name: _finalReward
inputs.description: Final reward on successful completion of all milestones of the modified version of proposal (in wei)

abiDocs.name: modifyProposal
abiDocs.notice: Modify a proposal (this can be done only before setting the final version)

inputs.name: _newDaoFundingManager
inputs.description: Address of the new DaoFundingManager contract, which would receive the remaining ETHs in this DAO

inputs.name: _newDaoContract
inputs.description: Address of the new DAO contract

abiDocs.name: migrateToNewDao
abiDocs.notice: Migrate this DAO to a new DAO contract

inputs.name: _proposalId
inputs.description: ID of the proposal

inputs.name: _newDoc
inputs.description: hash of the new IPFS doc

abiDocs.name: addProposalDoc
abiDocs.details: This is allowed only after a proposal is finalized. Before finalizing a proposal, proposer must modifyProposal. After the proposal is finalized, they can allProposalDoc to that proposal
abiDocs.notice: Add IPFS docs to a proposal

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
